DeleteAllMissionLogs.label: Delete All Mission Log Files
DeleteAllMissionLogs.help: Set to 1 to delete all mission log files after AAR

MusicVolume.label: Volume control for music
MusicVolume.help: 10 is normal, less reduces volume, cannot raise above 10

SaveOldMissions.label: Past missions to save
SaveOldMissions.help: Missions deleted after AAR - how far back to save

SoundVolume.label: Volume control for sounds
SoundVolume.help: 10 is normal, less reduces volume, cannot raise above 10

UseCoop.label: Use Coop
UseCoop.help: Set to 1 to create a coop mission
